title: The Horse in the gray flannel suit
creator_credit: Norman Tokar, Winston Hibler and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: An advertising executive under pressure to come up with a winning campaign uses, for inspiration, his daughter’s love of horses. This children’s film, centred on horses and equestrian pursuits, is a family-oriented comedy that stars Dean Jones, Fred Bolton, Diane Baker, Lloyd Bochner, Fred Clark and Ellen Janov.
